name: Glitchform
description:
Summary: A platformer set on a space station where you have to use a mod to move around rooms in the level. This game was made for Major Jam 4 with a theme of Cosmic and a limitation of the player has to cheat. 

How to play: A and  D to move left and right with W or Space to jump. There is also a directional dash on Shift. Interact with objects with E. The computer has rooms that you can drag with the mouse. Dragging one onto the other switches them. 

Thoughts: This was my first game jam, so I tried to go small. I think I went a little big as I didn't add as many levels as I wanted. Also, how the "cheating" works isn't very explained well in game I think. I also couldn't figure out how to get it in HTML without it breaking.  I'm happy I managed to finish it though.
